review: Did not work like I thought it would.
author: Gary Covert

review: This product is amazing, I did not have any issue all as per agreement
author: Matias

review: Best TV possibilities and best price.  I do not like that it has no built in menu.  Everything has to be done from a Phone or tablet on the same network.  Luckily everyone in our family has a phone or tablet but the apps are not compatible with non Google Play tablets or phones running Android 2.3.  That leaves out half my kids since they don't all have the latest model.
author: Fascinating Woman "Mother of Six"

review: Works well, but lack of Amazon Prime is really disappointing.
author: BCinDC

review: Bummer. I didn't know that you cant stream dvds from laptop onto TV with this. The only reason we bought it... Works great for everything else.
author: Tasha "Tasha R"

review: Just do it.  Buy it.  Buy this little thing.  I was skeptical, now i cant beleive I waited so long.  I gave these out like candy for xmas & everyone has had rave reviews as well.
author: Jeffrey B.

review: Chromecast is one of the best streaming devices. I love that anyone who comes over and connects to my Wi-Fi has the ability to stream to it.
